item.title: Comment on Pheromone Cologne by I’ve got love for you if you were born in the eighties | I'm Not That Drunk
item.dc:creator: I’ve got love for you if you were born in the eighties | I'm Not That Drunk
item.description: [...] Although Madonna may now be older, richer and more muscly than she was twenty five years ago, she doesn’t write better songs. The 1980s was her peak, with releases like ‘Material Girl’, ‘Dress You Up in My Love’, and ‘Into the Groove’. You’ll find them all on this album. Oh, and if you’re still a virgin, get some help from these pheromones. [...]
item.content:encoded: […] Although Madonna may now be older, richer and more muscly than she was twenty five years ago, she doesn’t write better songs. The 1980s was her peak, with releases like ‘Material Girl’, ‘Dress You Up in My Love’, and ‘Into the Groove’. You’ll find them all on this album. Oh, and if you’re still a virgin, get some help from these pheromones. […]

item.title: Comment on Girls, Guns & Ropes, hardcover by Alexandra Amateur
item.dc:creator: Alexandra Amateur
item.description: The world is not growing worse and it is not growing better - it is just turning around as usual.
item.content:encoded: The world is not growing worse and it is not growing better – it is just turning around as usual.
